author: nmk63
title: Memorable stay
text:
We had a memorable stay in this wonderful hotel from 1st to 5th March 2017.
The hotel was outstanding in all aspects especially the stars of the hotel were :
Ms Tracy Li ,words cannot describe her service and hospitality and kindness ,she literally went out of the way in providing excellent service in all aspects to us., Mr Fabian again a person who has such a friendly nature and was daily messaging us to check whether we needed anything and tried his best to provide us with Halal food for breakfast and would specifically sit and talk with us and discuss different aspects indeed a very humble gentleman.and the head chef of the peacock restaurant too.Furthermore most of the staff names of whom unfortunately I cannot remember . Mr Holy who personally escorted us to the Muslim restaurant and even arranged a car to pick us up.
Mrs Amy from housekeeping and the manageress of peacock restaurant who personally brought me the vegetarian soup from the Chinese restaurant and many other lovely staff from the door man to the bell boy and other staff who all had a lovely smile on their face and would rush to welcome us and assist us the moment we would arrive at the hotel doorsteps.
I have never felt this personal attention and warm welcome in any hotel before like WA of Beijing.
It felt like being among family members in other words home away from home.
Literally they would embarrass us in terms of their hospitality, warmth and kindness.
The room layout and view was also spectacular and so was the decor and amenities.
Excellent sound proofing and privacy for each room entrance.
Food quality and the ambiance in the breakfast hall was great too.
